name: ExpertSystem
0:
”Alexa, ask Expert System what lexicon do you know for cover.”
”Alexa, ask Expert System what lexicon do you know for boat.”
”Alexa, ask Expert System what ontology do you know for boat.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: expert system
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Expert System by Ai-Blockchain enables you to browse its extensive knowledge base and lexicon. The OpenCyc knowledge base has hundreds of thousands of terms organized in an ontology. The lexicon is based on WordNet and Wiktionary and is linked to the knowledge base. 
 The lexicon is a database of English dictionary definitions. The ontology is a knowledge base that organizes concepts in a generalization hierarchy. Some concepts are present in both the lexicon and ontology.

The user may browse the lexicon by asking "what lexicon do you know for {words}". For example, "Alexa, ask Expert System what is the lexicon for cover", or "Alexa, open expert system", followed by "lexicon for student".

The user my browse the ontology by asking "what ontology do you know for {words}. For example, "Alexa, ask Expert System what is the ontology for boat", or Alexa, open expert system", followed by "ontology for boat".

This skill responds to the built in intents for Help and Stop.
